definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
to put on a hat/to be first/to dub

pinyin: hua1 guan1 zhou4 kui1 xi1 niao3

sentences.english: The androecium is borne on the fused corolla.

sentences.english: Don't overwater, because it will cause leaf and crown rot.

definition: perianth (common term for calyx and corolla)/border and protecting envelope of a flower
